languageSelectionPage.header: Welcome to School Books and Supplies

welcomePage.info_1: To register for the school books and supplies benefit, click "Register".
welcomePage.info_2: If you have registered before for school books and supplies benefit, then click "Login" after entering your registered mobile number.
welcomePage.info_3: Please enter the same mobile number used during the registration process.
welcomePage.footer_header: For first time registrations click below.
welcomePage.error: Sorry! Something went wrong please try again
